mapper.sql: SELECT P.ID AS ID, P.DISPLAY_NAME AS DISPLAY_NAME, P.PRIVILEGE_NAME AS PRIVILEGE_NAME, P.PRIVILEGE_CODE AS PRIVILEGE_CODE, P.URL AS URL, P.PARENT_ID AS PARENT_ID, P.IS_DELETED AS IS_DELETED, P.CREATED_TIME AS CREATED_TIME, P.UPDATED_TIME AS UPDATED_TIME
mapper.select: SELECT P.ID AS ID, P.DISPLAY_NAME AS DISPLAY_NAME, P.PRIVILEGE_NAME AS PRIVILEGE_NAME, P.PRIVILEGE_CODE AS PRIVILEGE_CODE, P.URL AS URL, P.PARENT_ID AS PARENT_ID, P.IS_DELETED AS IS_DELETED, P.CREATED_TIME AS CREATED_TIME, P.UPDATED_TIME AS UPDATED_TIME, PP.DISPLAY_NAME AS PARENT_NAME FROM PRIVILEGE P INNER JOIN PRIVILEGE PP ON P.PARENT_ID = PP.ID WHERE P.IS_DELETED = 0 and P.ID = #{id}

SELECT P.ID AS ID, P.DISPLAY_NAME AS DISPLAY_NAME, P.PRIVILEGE_NAME AS PRIVILEGE_NAME, P.PRIVILEGE_CODE AS PRIVILEGE_CODE, P.URL AS URL, P.PARENT_ID AS PARENT_ID, P.IS_DELETED AS IS_DELETED, P.CREATED_TIME AS CREATED_TIME, P.UPDATED_TIME AS UPDATED_TIME, PP.DISPLAY_NAME AS PARENT_NAME FROM PRIVILEGE P INNER JOIN PRIVILEGE PP ON P.PARENT_ID = PP.ID WHERE P.IS_DELETED = 0
AND P.DISPLAY_NAME LIKE '%' #{displayName} '%'
AND P.CREATED_TIME > #{beginTime}
AND #{endTime} > P.CREATED_TIME
ORDER BY P.ID
FROM PRIVILEGE P WHERE P.IS_DELETED = 0 ORDER BY P.ID
FROM PRIVILEGE P WHERE P.IS_DELETED = 0 AND P.ID = #{id}
FROM PRIVILEGE P WHERE FIND_IN_SET(id, getChild(0))

FROM PRIVILEGE P WHERE FIND_IN_SET(id, getChild(#{parentId})) AND P.ID IN ( SELECT MRP.PRIVILEGE_ID AS ID FROM MAP_ROLE_PRIVILEGE MRP LEFT JOIN MAP_USER_ROLE MUR ON MRP.ROLE_ID = MUR.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN `USER` U ON MUR.USER_ID = U.ID and U.ID=#{userId} )

FROM PRIVILEGE P WHERE P.IS_DELETED = 0 AND P.PARENT_ID= #{parentId} AND P.ID IN ( SELECT MRP.PRIVILEGE_ID AS ID FROM MAP_ROLE_PRIVILEGE MRP LEFT JOIN MAP_USER_ROLE MUR ON MRP.ROLE_ID = MUR.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN `USER` U ON MUR.USER_ID = U.ID and U.ID=#{userId} )
mapper.update:
update PRIVILEGE
DISPLAY_NAME = #{displayName},
PRIVILEGE_NAME = #{privilegeName},
PRIVILEGE_CODE = #{privilegeCode},
url = #{url},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId},
UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime},
where id = #{id}

#{item}
